title: Senegalese TV Presenter and Singer Are Arrested in Crackdown on Homosexuality
summary_full: A TV presenter and one of Senegal’s best-known musicians appeared in court on Monday in one of the country’s most high-profile anti-gay cases in years.
summary_public: A TV presenter and one of Senegal’s best-known musicians appeared in court on Monday in one of the country’s most high-profile anti-gay cases in years.
